 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָפַץ‎</span>] **verb** ==shatter== (Late Hebrew ***id., dash, beat***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***napâƒu***</u></abbr>, ***shatter***, ***destroy*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 475</sup>; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְפַע‎</span> Pa\`el ***shatter***, but also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְפַץ‎</span> Pa\`el, ***id.***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***shake, break***, so Mandean, [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M. 240, and ZMG xxxii (1878), 406</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנָפוֺץ‎</span> with accusative [[Judg.7.19|Judg 7:19]] ***and a shattering*** (= ***and shattered***) the jars; ***Passive participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶצֶב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִבְזֶה נָפוּץ‎</span> [[Jer.22.28|Jer 22:28]] (figurative) ***a vessel to be despised*** (***and***) ***shattered*** (compare [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Gie|Gie]] [[BDB#Rothst|Rothst]]<sup>Kau</sup>); also ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹפֵץ‎</span> ***shatterer*** of the holy people [[Dan.12.7|Dan 12:7]] ([[BDB#Bev|Bev]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]]<sup>Kau</sup>, reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּכְלוֺת יַד נֹפֵץ‎</span>). **Pi\`el** ***dash to pieces:*** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִפֵּץ‎</span> consecutive [[Ps.137.9|Ps 137:9]] with accusative infants ag. (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>) rock; 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִפַּצְתִּ֫י‎</span> of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> dashing all in pieces with (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) Babylon as war-club [[Jer.51.20|Jer 51:20]]; [[Jer.51.21|Jer 51:21]] (twice in verse); [[Jer.51.22|Jer 51:22]] (3 t. in verse); [[Jer.51.23|Jer 51:23]] (3 t. in verse); suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִפַּצְתִּים אִישׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלאָֿחִיו‎</span> [[Jer.13.14|Jer 13:14]] ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּכְלִי יוֺצֵר תְּנַפְּצֵם‎</span> [[Ps.2.9|Ps 2:9]] (i.e. nations); 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִבְלֵיהֶם יְנַפֵּ֑צוּ‎</span> [[Jer.48.12|Jer 48:12]] (symbolic of destroying Moab); ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַפֵּץ יַדעַֿםקֹֿדֶשׁ‎</span> [[Dan.12.7|Dan 12:7]] ***when*** (***they***) ***finish shattering the hand*** (figurative for ***power***) ***of the holy people***, but read possibly <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹפֵץ‎</span>, see **Qal**; **\*\*** = ***break up*** rafts [[1Kgs.5.23|1Kgs 5:23]]. **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנֻפָּצוֺת‎</span> [[Isa.27.9|Isa 27:9]] like chalk-stones ***pulverized***. 



 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָפַץ‎</span> **verb** ==disperse, be scattered== (often taken as secondary √ from Niph\`al of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פוץ‎</span>, yet compare Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נפץ‎</span>, Qal (Participle), Pi\`el, ***scatter***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pour out, throw down***, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְפַץ‎</span>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***shake*** (irregular correspondence of sibilants compare [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>l.c</sup>.), Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***dissipari, aufugere*** [[BDB#Di|Di]] 713); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעָם מֵעָלַי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[1Sam.13.11|1Sam 13:11]] ***the people were scattered from me***; 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָָֽפְצָה כָלהָֿאָרֶץ‎</span> [[Gen.9.19|Gen 9:19]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) thence ***dispersed all*** (the population of) ***the earth***; 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָָֽמְצוּ גּוֺיִם‎</span> [[Isa.33.3|Isa 33:3]] ***nations were scattered; Passive participle*** feminine plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְפֻצוֺת יְהוּדָה‎</span> [[Isa.11.12|Isa 11:12]] ***the dispersed of Judah*** he shall collect (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִדְחֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל‎</span>).
